message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by our previous customers. Given its quality and the benefits it provides, I believe it's worth more than what the market typically offers. Considering its value to you, I propose a special introductory price of $99 for this product. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece that is worth over $100 to you, at a very attractive rate. I hope you'll find this offer compelling and decide to make it yours.
